question: The ultimate energy source for geothermal energy is which of the following? W) Radioactive decay of elements in the Earth’s interior X) Gravitational contraction of the Earth’s interior Y) Leftover thermal energy from the formation of the Earth’s interior Z) Energy from earthquakes in the Earth’s interior
answer: W) RADIOACTIVE DECAY OF ELEMENTS IN THE EARTH’S INTERIOR
